RTCIceTransportGatheringState.summary: The gatheringState read-only property of the interface returns a string that indicates the current gathering state of the ICE agent for this transport: "new", "gathering", or "complete".

remarks.para: You can detect when the value of this property changes by watching for an event of type .

Note that gatheringState represents the gathering state of just this transport, while represents the overall gathering state of the whole connection, including every used by every and every on the entire connection.

RTCIceTransportGatheringState.value: A string that indicates the current state of the ICE agent's candidate gathering process:
